sense.gloss: harassment by an Internet pitchfork mob, online shaming, flaming
ceremony for purifying a building site (before building commences), ground-breaking ceremony
event held the night before another event, eve (of a festival) (e.g. Christmas Eve)
important ceremonial occasions in family relationships
a day after the fair, (at a) stage when it's too late
Gion Festival (in Kyoto during the month of July, with high point on the 17th)
killing an enemy soldier before the start of a battle to raise spirits, blood offering

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓くにお↑祭↑↓まつり↓をやっているまちがありますか。

sdata.j: ヨハネの↑証言↑↓しょうげん↓はこうである。ユダヤ↑人達↑↓ひとたち↓が↑祭司↑↓さいし↓とレビ↑人↑↓じん↓をエルサレムからヨハネのもとに↑遣↑↓つか↓わして、あなたは↑誰↑↓だれ↓ですかと↑尋↑↓たず↓ねさせた。
